name: The Legend of Dad: Get 'Da Milk
name_original: The Legend of Dad: Get 'Da Milk
description:
Get 'Da Milk is an endless runner developed by PointLinkForce. This game asks the narrative question, "What happened to Dad when he went to get the milk all those years ago?"

-The team didn't have enough time during the Project Revival Jam 2 Itch.io challenge, but that hopefully leaves a  better idea of why the funny man in space is carrying a milk jug tying to dodge tentacles and space worms. Or, maybe it doesn't, but that's just how it is.

This game is currently presented as a limited prototype. While it's a bit rough around the polygons, we hope that there is still a minor amount of fun to be had.

Thanks for playing! Or reading, depending on how far you get.

-Team PLF.
